name: Hellawai
description:
This Game Was Made In 7 Days For The "Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2"

╔═══☽✧   Controls   ✧☾═══╗

AS Or ← → - Moving Left And Right

W Or ↑ - Jumping

E - Interact With Objects

F - Board Your Allay

Q - Swap Control 

╚═══☽✧      ✦     ✧☾═══╝

╔═══☽✧   Powers   ✧☾═══╗

Devil - Walking On Lava

Angel - Double Jump

╚═══☽✧      ✦     ✧☾═══╝

╔═══☽✧   About Us  ✧☾═══╗

Ayve:

Hello, I'm The Artist Of This Game. But I Have Learn To Use Unity... I've Been Using It For The Past Two Year. I Wanted The Art For This Game To Feel Friend And Inviting... That Why Even Something As Scary As The DEVIL... Can Look So Sweet And Nice. I Hope I Made The Puzzles Of This Game Easy Enough So You Don't Get Stuck, But Also Hard Enough To Make You Feel The Challenge. This Was My First Time Creating Puzzle So If You Have Any Feedback For Me, Feel Free To Write It Down In The Description. That All From Me. Bye.

Dusty:

Balls :D
